arguments.name: dirPath
arguments.description: Path to the directory to be registered or reseted.

arguments.name: serviceMapping
arguments.description: Alternate string to be used for application name while calling the REST service.

arguments.name: default
arguments.description: set if the mapping is a default mapping or not

arguments.name: password
arguments.description: password for the web administrator, this is needed when you update/create a REST mapping.

name: restinitapplication
description:
Registers the directory path with the service mapping provided. 
		If no service mapping is provided, the application name is used. 
		If the rest application is already registered, it is refreshed.
